text:
Hello! Are you hungry? I am hungry. Hey, let´s
sit down here and have a snack. Yeah!

It´s an apple, here you are. It´s an apple,
here you are.

An apple, yeah! Thank you, thank you!
It´s an apple, yum, yum, yum.

It´s an apple, here you are. It´s an apple,
here you are.

An apple, oh! Thank you, thank you!
It´s an apple, yum, yum, yum.

All together! Yummy, yummy, yummy, yummy,
yum, yum, yum!

It´s an orange, here you are. It´s an orange,
here you are.

An orange, yeah! Thank you, thank you!
It´s an orange, yum, yum, yum.

It´s an orange, here you are. It´s an orange,
here you are.

An orange, great! Thank you, thank you!
It´s an orange, yum, yum, yum.

Come on everyone! Haha! Yummy, yummy, yummy,
yummy, yum, yum, yum!
